should render emphasis
.
*em*
.
<p><em>em</em></p>
.

should render hr
.

---
.
<hr />
.

should render strong
.
**bolded**
.
<p><strong>bolded</strong></p>
.

should render headers
.
# Header
## Header
### Header
#### Header
##### Header
###### Header
.
<h1>Header</h1>
<h2>Header</h2>
<h3>Header</h3>
<h4>Header</h4>
<h5>Header</h5>
<h6>Header</h6>
